About me

I am a 24 year old software developer currently working in Johannesburg, South Africa for BSG. I completed my honors in Computer Science at the University of the Witwatersrand (my research focusing on demosaicking and decorrelation stretch methods) in 2017.

I’m familiar with Java, Python and C, and I have some experience in Javascript, PHP, CSS, Delphi, Typescript, Go, and shell scripting. I have studied Image Procssing, Computer Vision, and Robotics - among other subjects. I am familiar with Docker, Kubernetes, Spring (and other Java frameworks) - among other technologies.

My hobbies include working on small coding and linux related projects, as well as viewing a variety of films (I suppose I could be called a “film buff”).
